details:
postgresql-mulicorn python version was non conformant to PEP440,
and may break unreleated
software like pip, a python package manager, used for local
development of python packages.


For Debian 10 buster, this problem has been fixed in version
1.3.4-4+deb10u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your postgresql-multicorn packages.


For the detailed security status of postgresql-multicorn please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/postgresql-multicorn>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
